description.value:
+10 to all Tech-Use Tests made in Battle Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Mechanicus Cog with three circles worked above the skull

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for successful Tech-Use Test to repair a vehicle or equipment which was vital to the unit later in the conflict.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
